title: PIZZA BURGERS [VEGAN, GLUTEN-FREE]
directions: Small dice the onion and leek.
Mince the garlic or use a garlic press.
Water or oil sauté the onions, leeks and garlic until just soft.
Add the mixture to the food processor along with the beans, seasoning, nooch, fresh parsley, quinoa flakes and a pinch of salt. Process until combined.
Form into burgers and either bake or cook in a non-stick skillet with a little oil until browned on both sides and heated through.
ingredients: 1 1/4 cups cooked cannellini beans (equals a can)
Handful of fresh parsley + extra for garnish
